headline.main: RED ARMY THRUSTS APPROACH MOGILEV; 460 Towns Freed in Drive on Central Front -- Nazis Claim Victory at Zaporozhye RED ARMY THRUSTS APPROACH MOGILEV RED ARMY PUSHES AHEAD ON CENTRAL FRONT

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, Oct. 2 -- Soviet troops battered through German defenses in White Russia to reach the Pronya River, twenty-nine miles from Mogilev, Moscow announced today, while the Germans claimed a major defense victory in the south after a bitter five-day battle.
abstract: USSR forces gain, Mogilev, Vitebsk and Gomel areas; Gers claim victory near Zaporozhye; Paris radio repts Ger recapture of Kremenchus; map
